name: Giant Frilled Lizard
description: The Giant Frilled Lizard is a large, intimidating beast with impressive physical capabilities, characterized by its vibrant frills that it extends when charging.
memorable: Its ability to frighten opponents with a fear-inducing charge makes it a unique and dangerous creature in battle.
goals: The lizard typically seeks to defend its territory or hunt for food.
relations: It may be encountered in the company of other reptiles or as part of a diverse ecosystem.
environment: Prefers warm, forested areas or jungles.
strengths: High Dexterity allows it to evade attacks and increased speed during its charge enhances its combat prowess.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence renders it incapable of strategic thinking.
attacks: Can perform a multiattack with a bite that inflicts piercing and poison damage, and a tail attack that deals bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Intimidating Charge, which can frighten enemies and increase its speed.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and has a passive Perception of 14.
skills: Has notable proficiency in Athletics, making it capable at climbing and physical feats.
additional_information: Can charge at enemies, causing fear.
High agility for an effective defensive style.
Relies on physical strength rather than intelligence.
Known for its hissing behavior when threatened.
test_queries: agile creature that can instill fear
poison dealing bite and tail attacks
